Bear Miss Anderson:
Tour card of February 19, addressed to the Chicago Board of Education regarding
information on educational recordings, has been referred to me*
Tt appears that you raif^bt be interested in an active membership in the Association
for Education by Radio-Television. Founded sixteen years ago, AERT is a non-profit
organization, national in scope, which includes among its members teachers and admin¬
istrators on all-levels of education, commercial broadcasters, religious broadcasters,
civic leaders, parents, and representatives of many leading civic groups.
From the information contained on your card, it appears that you would be par¬
ticularly interested in the Journal of the Association for Education by Radio-Tele¬
vision. This magazine is published monthly during the academic year. It contains
articles on the utilization and evaluation of both educational radio and educational
television materials. Specifically, articles in the Journal cover a diverse number
of topics including areas of communication theory, practical program and promotional
ideas, helpful how-to-do-it and how-to-find-it suggestions, as well as reports on
listener council and other evaluation activities.
You will be interested to know that the Association for Education by Radio-
Television serves as one of the sponsors of the rational Tape Recording Catalogue
and Re-recording Service, a project set up in cooperation with the Department of
Audio and Visual Instruction of the National Education Association.
I am enclosing a copy of the AERT membership blank which contains a statement
of the objectives and advantages of membership in the Association.
I am sure that you would find that a membership in A^KT would provide you with
both services and materials which would be of great use yn your work. By sending in
your membership application in the next few weeks, you will be eligible to attend the
Association’s national convention to be held this year on April 17, coincident with
the Ohio State Radio and Television Institute in Columbus, Ohio.
If I can help you with any further information about AIRT, please let me know.
Sincerely,
John Adams Rourke
National Membership Chairman
AERT
